content.question: Which of the following best describes the motion of the carts immediately after the collision?

choices.label: Cart <math alttext="A" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math> is moving to the left and Cart <math alttext="B" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></math> is moving to the right.

Cart <math alttext="A" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math> is stationary and Cart <math alttext="B" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></math> is moving to the right.
Both carts are moving to the right at the same speed.
Both carts are moving to the right, but they travel at different speeds.

content.answer: Both carts are moving to the right, but they travel at different speeds.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
